title: Prof. Martin Lettau honored for quantitative finance research
author: Laura Counts
excerpt:
Berkeley Haas Prof. Martin Lettau has been awarded the 2019 Roger F. Murray Prize for outstanding research from The Institute for Quantitative Research in Finance (The Q Group). Lettau, the Kruttschnitt Family Chair in Financial Institutions, received the first-place honor for his presentation of “Factors That Fit Time Series and Cross-Section of Stock Returns,” a […]
The post Prof. Martin Lettau honored for quantitative finance research appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
